index.title: Connect all your tools, get answers
index.content: Search, ask, create reports and work with all your data in a single place

search.title: Find information instantly
search.caption: Search
search.content: Connect all your apps from emails to CRMs or document drives, to search for your company knowledge in a single place, instantly.

ask.title: Ask questions & co-create with AI
ask.caption: Ask
ask.content: Ask all your questions about a client or your engineering best practices, and summarise meetings, create reports or quickly analyze large quantities of information.

onboarding.title: Faster team onboarding, less repeated questions
onboarding.caption: Onboarding
onboarding.content: Focus on objectives rather than where to find policy_revised_final_two.docx.

security.caption: Our commitment
security.title: Maximum Security
security.content:
Your data is important and sensitive. We take it seriously and are taking a proactive approach to data security. We have been certified cyber essentials plus in the UK and are working towards ISO 27001 compliance. Self-hosted option are available in the meantime.

More importantly, we will NEVER sell your data, or use it to train AI without your consent.

secure-encryption.title: Secure encryption
secure-encryption.content: Your data is encrypted using AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit.

strict-permission-enforcement.title: Strict permission enforcement
strict-permission-enforcement.content: We are using role-based access control to ensure that only you have access to your data, and no one else.

eu-data-residency.title: EU data residency
eu-data-residency.content: We are using servers in the EU, your data stays in the EU, and is protected by the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

trusted-ai-providers.title: Trusted AI providers
trusted-ai-providers.content: We are using trusted AI providers that are transparent about their practices, and we choose to self-host our AI models whenever possible.

faq.description: Can't find you answer here? We can help!

data-location.question: Where is my data stored?
data-location.answer: Our servers are located in Frankfurt, Germany. We also have a backup service in London, UK.

data-training.question: Is my data used to train AI?
data-training.answer0: No, by default we are not using your data to train AI.
data-training.answer1: On the enterprise plan, we can create custom AI models using your data, those models are exclusive to your company.

AI-providers.question: Which AI providers do you use?
AI-providers.answer: A detailed list will be available soon, but we currently use AWS bedrock. We will not use OpenAI.

marketing-banner.title: Get knowledge superpowers
marketing-banner.content: Ready to start? Get in touch or create your account and get started in minutes.

footer.made-with: Made with ❤️ in Edinburgh, Montpellier & Chennai
